body:
Python 3.4.3
Sphinx 1.8.3
Cython 0.29.3

cython/docs/conf.py still has on line 44 in the list of extensions: 'sphinx.ext.pngmath'

This has been deprecated for over 2 years, no longer exists for latest Sphinx 1.8.3. and has been replaced by sphinx.ext.imgmath

This causes building of documentation to fail with

     Running Sphinx v1.8.3

     Extension error:
     Could not import extension sphinx.ext.pngmath (exception: No module named 'sphinx.ext.pngmath')

Changing the conf.py entry to 'sphinx.ext.imgmath' cures the problem and the documentation in "man", "html", and "text" can now be built.  

(Former issue with text document building using python 2.7 + cython 0.25.2 + sphinx 1.5.5 previously reported issue  #1665  no longer occurs and so that issue is now closed.)

There are still numerous warnings though.

     -------------Building of Manual Pages ----------------
     PYTHONPATH="/usr/lib/python3.5:/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages:/usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/Cython:/usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs" \
_ make "man"
   sphinx-build -b man -d build/doctrees -D latex_paper_size=a4  . build/man

     making output directory...
     WARNING: unknown config value 'latex_paper_size' in override, ignoring
     loading intersphinx inventory from https://docs.python.org/3/objects.inv...
     building [mo]: targets for 0 po files that are out of date
     building [man]: all manpages
     updating environment: 53 added, 0 changed, 0 removed
     reading sources... [100%] src/userguide/wrapping_CPlusPlus

     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/tutorial/related_work.rst:44: WARNING: duplicate citation Pyrex, other instance in /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/quickstart/overview.rst
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/extension_types.rst:853: WARNING: Unexpected indentation.
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/memoryviews.rst:19: WARNING: Unknown target name: "pep 3118".
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/memoryviews.rst:227: WARNING: Unknown target name: "new style buffers".
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/memoryviews.rst:227: WARNING: Unknown target name: "pep 3118".
     looking for now-outdated files... none found
     pickling environment... done
     checking consistency... /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/CONTRIBUTING.rst: WARNING: document isn't included in any toctree
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/examples/README.rst: WARNING: document isn't included in any toctree
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/reference/directives.rst: WARNING: document isn't included in any toctree

     sphinx-build -b html -d build/doctrees -D latex_paper_size=a4  . build/html

     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/language_basics.rst:245: WARNING: unknown keyword: None
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/language_basics.rst:245: WARNING: unknown keyword: False
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/language_basics.rst:245: WARNING: unknown keyword: NULL
     /usr/src/build/Cython-0.29.3/docs/src/userguide/special_methods.rst:14: WARNING: unknown keyword: cdef class
     generating indices...

     sphinx-build -b text -d build/doctrees -D latex_paper_size=a4  . build/text

comment_data.body: Thanks. I resolved the `pngmath` issue. PR to fix the warnings is welcome.

title: Cython 0.29.3 : Building of documentation fails because sphinx.ext.pngmath is no longer deprecated, it does not exist
